name: pdmp_bamboo
description: PDMP Bamboo Plugin - Streamlined integration for PDMP requests with BambooHealth PMP Gateway. Provides structured assessment commands and API endpoints for prescription drug monitoring program data retrieval.

protocols.description: PDMP Request Protocol - Extracts Canvas patient and provider data, generates structured assessment commands, and sends PDMP requests to BambooHealth test environment for prescription drug monitoring
PDMP Report API Endpoint - RESTful endpoint for generating and retrieving PDMP reports with patient prescription history and provider information
